prompts: Create a plant-type Pokemon with vibrant green leaves and a whimsical flower face.
Imagine a small, yellow Pokemon that resembles a plant with a unique bell shape.
Design a nature-loving Pokemon that thrives in forests and has a playful personality.
Show me a cute yellow Pokemon with a long, serpentine body and green leaf-like appendages.
Generate a whimsical Pokemon that looks like a combination of a flower and a water droplet.
Make a Pokemon that embodies the essence of a sunny day with bright colors and cheerful vibes.
Give me a Pokemon that has a unique blend of plant and poison traits, with a cute appearance.
